\[ P(\text{HHHTT}) = \left( \frac{1}{2} \right)^5 \]

\[ P(\text{HHHTT}) = \frac{1}{32} \]

Therefore, the probability that the coin will land heads up on the first 3 flips and not on the last 2 flips is \( \frac{1}{32} \).

The correct option is:
